<div>  
  <h3> Help Function </h3>
  <h4>&emsp; Syntax </h4>
  <p> 
     &emsp;  &emsp;```??<object>```, where ```<object>```
    is the thing you want to learn more about. Type this in the <b>Console.</b>
  </p>
  <h4>&emsp; Usage</h4>
  <p>
    &emsp;&emsp; RStudio will open the <b>Viewer</b> window, displaying 
    information related to the <i>object</i> of interest.
  </p>
  <h4> &emsp; Output </h4>
  <p>
    &emsp; &emsp; A <b>Viewer</b> with information.

  <h3> Glimpse Function </h3>
  <h4> &emsp; Syntax </h4>
  <p>
    &emsp;  &emsp; ```glimpse( <object> )```
  </p>
  
  <h4>  &emsp; Usage </h4>
  <p>
    &emsp; &emsp; RStudio will output a short excerpt of data. <br>
    &emsp; &emsp; This data will contain row, and column information, along            with a few valid rows.
  </p>
  <h4> &emsp; Output </h4>
  <p>
    &emsp; &emsp; A tibble of data; by default into the console<br>
  </p>



</div>
